General.Name: CareRay Digital Medical Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: CareRay Digital Medical Technology Co., Ltd. engages in research and development, manufacturing, sales, and marketing of digital X-ray flat panel detectors in China. The company offers wireless high-speed dynamic boards, new CMOS sensors, and IGZO new flat panel detectors. Its products are used for clinical examinations, such as medical radiographs, breast examinations, fluoroscopy, and pet medical treatment, as well as treatment of radiotherapy and interventional surgery. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Ping  Zhang
1.Title: CFO, Sec. of the Board & Director
